javelin.model.world

Class WorldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WorldMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Game world overview. This is focused on generating the initial game state. forest is the background. have 2 plain areas (1 is player start), 3 mountain areas and 1 swamp. TODO would be nice to have tiles reflect the official d20 terrains (add desert and hill)
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    WorldScreen, Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WorldMap.Region
      A region is a sector of the world with a certain game difficulty associated to it.
